name: Bow em' - GameJam version
description:
https://the-heli-pilot.itch.io/bow-em - updated version

Bow em' is a small game I made for Friday night game jam and was made in 3 hours. 

You control a gladiator and you need to shoot your bow and avoid enemies to survive as long as you can.

You can pick up brown arrow boxes to replenish your arrows, but dont pick them up if you have 30 already because its the maximum!

Controls => wsad/arrows for movement, LMB to shoot bow
